name: LightBender (itch) (wund3rcr4zy)
description:
Created for Weekly Game Jam 144 - Theme 'In The Dark'

Defend yourself against waves of killbots armed with weaponized orbs of light.

But be cautious, killbots are impervious to colors other than the one they are wearing.

(Credits for work found in 'README.txt or Credits.txt')
